channel.title: This is so annoying!
channel.description: My server is so popular, but i cant even log into it!! It sucks. I would lov to know about a tut that limits the amount of people. Anyone know? I will be eternily grateful, and let u be an admin. Or i would like a tut that restricts acsess usless your an Mod+, that i can take on and off.

item.title: This is so annoying!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Typh:

no, i want to find out if i can put a limit on players playing at once , or a tut where I can make it only mods and up can play for when its on

Can’t be done based on playerRights. If you were to do it, you’d have to base it on each individuals IP/DNS. That way, if their IP address is found on a list, they can bypass the maximum player limit somehow. Maybe I’ll look at it tomorrow… I’m sure it’s not too hard to do.

Read full topic

item.title: This is so annoying!
item.dc:creator: @axl axl
item.description:
@axl wrote:

ok my mini tut for you !

first off all search something called
playerhandler.java

open in notepad and search for

public static final int maxPlayers = 1000;

now if you want a limit of 30 players

make it look at this

public static final int maxPlayers = 30;

so change to 1000 to the number of players you want

Read full topic
